Key: O-Oh, Shido... Welcome back.
Hey... uh, I'm home.

(...It's hard to look her in the eye after what
happened earlier. I guess I'll have to do my best
to not lead the conversation that way.)
Tohka, so you got back first, huh?

Yeah, I realized I was back here after the date.
So, um... Master?
*Cough*! T-Tohka... Forget about that. Please!
N-No, Shido! I just made a mistake!

Let's forget that it happened. Both of us.
Okay...?

Y-Yeah, that is probably for the best!
Let's do that.
Phew...
But, I honestly didn't mind that about you...
What?! T-Tohka, did you say something?

N-No, nothing! Anyways, Shido... Maria isn't
back yet.
Maria?

(According to Tohka, Maria didn't come back from
school. Come to think of it, I totally forgot that
I was looking for Maria at school.)

She said she wanted to look around school a
little more, but she should have just gone home
with us.
Shido, I'll go with you to get her.

Oh, thanks Tohka. Two heads are better than one,
right?
Well that, too... but I also want to be with you.
I-I see... Then, shall we?

(I wonder what's up? Maybe because of what just
happened, she seems more forward.)

Tohka, what do you think is going through Maria's
mind?
Hm? What do you mean by that?

I'm just wondering if I'm doing a good job at
showing Maria what she wants to see.
Hmm, what Maria wants to see... I don't know.
Yeah, I guess...

But I don't think you've been wrong about it.
I mean, you've done well thus far. You saved me.
That's why it should be fine!
...Thanks, Tohka.

Anyways, where is she? Can you look over there,
Tohka?
Okay, I will!
Oh, nevermind... I found her.
So you've found me.

What's the matter, Maria? Did you find something
interesting at school?
...Yes. There was something like that.
What was it?

More importantly... I'm happy that you've come to
look for me.
M-Maria?! What's the matter...?!
Just as I thought. The reaction I expected.
Th-The reaction you expected? What do you mean?

I thought that if I did this, you'd come looking
for me. If you do this in a game, your heart
skips a beat, right?
Maria...

(I knew it. I think Maria is slowly starting to
change.)

H-Hey! You can step away now! If you're too close
to Shido... Um, well, you just can't!
Understood.

Okay, good response. Shido, we found Maria, so
let's go home and eat dinner.
Hey wait, Tohka! Don't pull me so hard.
Shido...?
Hm? What is it?

(Maria slowly walked beside me, and I took her
hand. The three of us began to walk home together.
Maria has truly become part of our family.)

(We continued to hold each others' hands as we
walked home.)
